front.title: IEEE Guide for Installation of Oil-Immersed EHV Transformers 345 kV and Above

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Large, oil-immersed power transformers with high-voltage windings rated 345 kV and above are considered. Inspection on receipt, internal inspection at the site, preliminary oil filling, assembly, vacuum treatment and final filling, vacuum drying of insulation, recirculation, and energization are covered.
